definitions.definition: To good-naturedly make fun of (someone); to roast .
examples: To survive in the hood, you need to know how to jone .
definitions.label_groups: intransitive , transitive , African-American Vernacular , slang , often followed by on

main_definition: ( intransitive , transitive , African-American Vernacular , slang , often followed by on ) To good-naturedly make fun of (someone); to roast .
